CodeDeliveryFailureException: Invalid email provided / Unable to send the email
CodeMismatchException: Invalid verification code provided, please try again
LimitExceededException: Attempt limit exceeded, please try after some time
PasswordResetRequiredException: A password reset is required to log in
TooManyFailedAttemptsException: Too many requests, try again later
TooManyRequestsException: Too many requests, try again later
UsernameExistsException: Email address / username already exists for a user
